DOC.brief_summary: Postoperative handovers to the post anaesthesia care unit (PACU) in adult anaesthesia are described as incomplete and unstructured, although their relevance for the patient safety is well known. It must be assumed that for children, this handover is at least comparable important. With a self-developed checklist information transfer during postoperative handovers will be documented and subsequently compared with patient information in anaesthesia records.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Handover to a Post Anaesthesia Care Unit in a Children's Hospital
DOC.criteria: All patients transferred to the PACU after surgery Age > 18 years
